dict.acceptation: 炸弹；彻底的失败；[橄榄球] 长传；高压贮罐；
投弹；[俚语] 惨败；[俚语] 涂鸦；

sent.orig: In such words as hymn, condemn, bomb, for example, the last letter of each is silent.
sent.trans: 在如hymn,condemn,bomb这些词里，每一个单词的最后一个字母是不发音的。

sent.orig: They're going to fine us $1 per F-bomb.
sent.trans: 他们(FCC)准备每一个F-bomb罚款1美元。

sent.orig: Later, they came to bomb, bomb, bomb; that's when we also had a very depressing time.
sent.trans: 后来，他们开始轰炸，没完没了地轰炸，我们也感到沮丧。

sent.orig: If China does not have atom bomb, bomb, won't have today's international influence and place.
sent.trans: 中国假如没有原子弹、氢弹，就不会有今天的国际影响和地位。

sent.orig: The bomb squad were titled in to deactivate the car bomb.
sent.trans: 有关部门请来爆破小组拆除这枚汽车炸弹。
